title: Unveiling the ion sensing capabailities of ‘click’ derived chalcone-tailored 1,2,3-triazolic isomers for Pb(II) and Cu(II) ions: DFT analysis
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,15374-15390
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA01471E, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Riddima Singh, Gurleen Singh, Nancy George, Gurjaspreet Singh, Pooja Malik, Harminder Singh, Gurpreet Kaur, Jandeep Singh
Two new chalcone-based 1,2,3-triazole derivatives have been synthesised using ‘CuAAC’ for Cu(II) and Pb(II) ion detection.
